```{r}

library(rvest)

page.source <- read_html("http://www.appledaily.com.tw/realtimenews/section/new/")
page.source
```

```{r}

content<-html_nodes(page.source, '.rtddt h1')
content

```


```{r}

news.title <- html_text(content)

for (i in 1:length(news.title)) {
  
  print(news.title[i])
  
}

```
